name: Space In Motion: FutureTrade
description:
You left your small trading business and your home planet because your owed a criminal syndicate money after they took over the world and fled to a moon. Nearly all your remaining funds went into a truck, so you could start trading again. But the syndicate hired an assassin to point the way what happens to traitors. So the time is working against you, while you are trying to earn the money for an own space ship to escape once again.

In 2000 this DOS game had been originally released to German speaking retail markets on CD-ROM in a box. Over twenty years later I decided to release the code as open source and bundle the game with the DOSBox-X emulator in an easy to install and run package for Windows.

Up the now the game is only available in German! Maybe it will be translated in the future but that is not guaranteed.
